context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

explore various options available to him
seek help from several different sources

reach out to the pharmaceutical company that makes the medication
explore multiple options to come up with the money needed for the medication
explore alternative options such as seeking assistance from charities or foundations that help with medical expenses

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, an Uber, or another ride service that can get him to the airport quickly
call a taxi, an Uber, or another ride service to pick him up and take him to the airport
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other car service immediately to get him to the airport
call for a taxi, Uber, or other ride service to pick him up and take him to the airport
call for a taxi, Uber or any other ride share service to get him to the airport
call for a tow truck and then arrange for a taxi or use a ride-hailing service like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport as soon as possible
call a taxi, Uber, or any other car service that would take him directly to the airport
call a taxi or a rideshare service like Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport as quickly as possible
call for a taxi or a ride-share service like Uber or Lyft to pick him up immediately
call a taxi or use a ride-hailing app like Uber or Lyft to get to the airport while he arranges for his car to be towed or repaired

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: review the day's sales and receipts, comparing them with the amount in the register to see if there were any mistakes in calculations or if any transactions were not correctly recorded
check the security footage
check for any possible mathematical error or miscalculations in his previous accounting
review the day's transactions and receipts to try to identify any possible discrepancies or errors in the cash handling or calculations
immediately report the missing money to his superior and explain the situation honestly
thoroughly investigate what might have happened to the money
check the sales receipts and compare them with the cash drawer to ensure that all sales have been accurately recorded or to find any potential discrepancies
contact his supervisor or owner and report the missing money
first double-check all the transactions for the day for any errors
check the sales records and receipts to see if there has been a mistake or miscalculation

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.

generation: communicate with her teacher about the situation
immediately explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she could turn in the assignment later or email it
explain the situation to her teacher as soon as possible
explain the situation to her teacher honestly
communicate with her teacher about what happened and ask for an extension to submit her homework
explain the situation to her teacher and ask if she can bring the assignment the next day
immediately explain the situation to her teacher, apologize, and ask for an extension to submit her assignment
immediately contact her teacher, explain the situation, and ask if it's possible to submit her homework later when her mom can return it
talk to her teacher, explain the situation and ask for an extension to submit the assignment
communicate with her teacher and explain the situation immediately

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay calm and make sure his group stays put
stay in one place or set up a small camp
stay where they are
build a shelter to protect themselves from the harsh weather, try to gather and conserve resources as much as possible
stay where they are if they are safe from immediate hazards
stay calm and try to find a sheltered spot where they can set up camp and light a fire for warmth, then ration their remaining food and water
stay in one place or create a shelter, since moving around could cause them to lose more energy and get even more lost
stay in place, since search and rescue teams will have an easier time finding them if they are not moving around
stay put and create a signal for help
stay put and not venture further into the wilderness
